refnamediv.refpurpose: Prebuilt common menu/toolbar items and corresponding icons

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
void gimp_stock_init (void);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GIMP registers a set of menu/toolbar items and corresponding icons in addition to the standard GTK+ stock items. These can be used just like GTK+ stock items. GIMP also overrides a few of the GTK+ icons (namely the ones in dialog size).
Stock icons may have a RTL variant which gets used for right-to-left locales.

refsect2.title: gimp_stock_init ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the GIMP stock icon factory.
You don't need to call this function as gimp_ui_init() already does this for you.
